Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the involvement of Barack Obama in funding the missiles launched at American forces in Iraq from Iran.
Lack enough support: There is no evidence provided to support the claim that the missiles were funded by Barack Obama with American tax dollars.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the funds provided to Iran as part of the Iran nuclear deal were used to fund the missiles, which is not supported by any evidence.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the funds provided to Iran were their own assets that had been frozen as an economic sanction.
Exist alternative explanation: The alternative explanation is that the missiles were funded by Iran itself, using their own assets that were unfrozen as part of the Iran nuclear deal.
